# Logging In

After creating a `JATOS` account with the help of the department IT ([pbs-help@uiowa.edu](mailto:pbs-help@uiowa.edu)), log in here:

<https://jatos.psychology.uiowa.edu>

# `jsPsych`

To convert [`jsPsych`](jsPsych.qmd) tasks to `JATOS`, see here:
<https://www.jatos.org/3.6.x/jsPsych-and-JATOS.html> (archived at <https://perma.cc/W82S-6FU9>)
